weka.distributed.spark

Class MLlibClassifierSparkJob

  • java.lang.Object
    • distributed.core.DistributedJob
      • weka.distributed.spark.SparkJob
        • weka.distributed.spark.MLlibClassifierSparkJob
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, weka.core.CommandlineRunnable, weka.core.EnvironmentHandler, weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.gui.beans.ClassifierProducer

    public class MLlibClassifierSparkJob
extends SparkJob
implements weka.core.CommandlineRunnable, weka.gui.beans.ClassifierProducer
    Job for executing a MLLib classifier on a Spark cluster
    Author:
    Mark Hall (mhall{[at]}pentaho{[dot]}com)
    See Also:
